word: 14 (see EGW on Matthew 27:50;  3:14-17). Satan Vanquished at the Cross.--He [Christ] vanquished Satan in the same nature over which in Eden Satan obtained the victory. The enemy was overcome by Christ in His human nature. The power of the Saviour's Godhead was hidden. He overcame in human nature, relying upon God for power (YI April 25, 1901).
